remarks:
1 is a complex number.  Axiom 2 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-1cn .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Apr-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
